name: Order could not be created with invalid Ingredients hash sums
description: Send POST request to {{baseURI}}/api/orders with Access Token and with invalid Ingredients hash sums and check that order is not created

steps.name: Send POST request to "/api/auth/register" without auth
Deserialize response as ExtendedUser object and add password
Send GET request to "/api/ingredients" without auth
Get random Ingredient from array of Ingredients with type "bun"

steps.name: Send POST request to "/api/orders" with body parameter ingredients and value [6kmxa7nil6h2tgnj5urruudpd, gvflcponuzqgemzzmhfefpo50, nl1zkdejt12zvsrtd1s7ntpei] and with auth token
Check that response code is equal to 500
Send DELETE request to "/api/auth/user" with auth token
